about_the_game:
Continue to explore the colorful world of PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 with two new isands in the Season Pass!

"Encore Peak"
This peak use to be an enclave where many monsters would hide.
Their territorial dispute becoming more intense, the area was sealed
and no Tiki was allowed to venture out there.
The seal now appear to have been lifted and Tikis can now set on a
new adventure!

”Kibogamine”
The Kibogamine is a sacred land preserved to hold an ancient festival
that has lived on until today!
The rumor said divine beasts wearing Bear faces live there.
Only Elite Tikimans seeking glory shall enter this domain.

The Kibogamine is a sacred land preserved to hold an ancient festival

name: PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: i3-3000 series or better Dual Core CPU. i5 or better recommended.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 or better.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Continue to explore the colorful world of PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 with two new isands in the Season Pass!
